description: Euler transform of Pascal's triangle A007318.
comments: Number of partitions of n objects, k of which are black, into parts each of which is a sequence of objects. E.g. T(3,1) = 7; the partitions are [BWW], [WBW], [WWB], [BW,W], [WB,W], [WW,B] and [B,W,W]. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jan 10 2007
links: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
formula: G.f. = Product_{i=1}^{infinity} Product_{j=0}^i 1/(1 - x^i y^j)^C(i,j). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jan 10 2007
author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2000
